transcript:
pouches, while others were firing, though who they were firing at could not be seen for the smoke which there was no wind to carry away. A pleasant humming and whistling of bullets were often heard. "What is this?" thought Prince Andrew approaching the crowd of sol- diers. "It can't be an attack, for they are not moving; it can't be a squarefor they are not drawn up for that."
